quiz_questions.question_text: Which of the following statements hold true for an authoring environment?
presented_options: On an authoring environment, website visitors can post comments on the individual pages or interact with the forums
The authoring environment is usually located behind a company's firewall
Authoring environment provides an easy to use graphical user interface for creating the content
An author in WCM generates the material that which will, at some point, be published to your website
correct_options: The authoring environment is usually located behind a company's firewall
Authoring environment provides an easy to use graphical user interface for creating the content
An author in WCM generates the material that which will, at some point, be published to your website
quiz_questions.question_source: Technical Foundation Skills - Getting Started - Test Out

quiz_questions.question_text: What are some best practices for using AEM with Adobe Campaign?
presented_options: Implement Adobe Target with AEM for sending email
Do not use javascript or flash
Use or extend the ootb components in AEM designed to work with Campaign
correct_options: Use or extend the ootb components in AEM designed to work with Campaign
Do not use javascript or flash

quiz_questions.question_text: Which AEM page property enables shorter, more expressive URLs?
Which design type provide different URLs for different devices?
One of the main reasons for tagging is to quickly and easily classify content for your website.
When you finish editing a page, you must save it to keep all your changes.
Within the references menu, which sub-menu would you go to to enable Production Ready?
Design mode lets you specify the types of components that will appear in Edit mode.
Where is content duplicated when you promote launch content? .
Which capability of AEM Sites allows authors to see what has changed on a page for version, launch and language copies?
Which two configurations on your AEM web console configuration manager do you need to update with your machine IPv4 address?
You can promote a launch copy of a page to the source copy.
AEM Sites allows you to compare a re-translated language copy of a page with a previous language copy.
Which component in a responsive layout acts as a paragraph system into which you can add other components?
Where do you go to add metadata once an asset has been uploaded to the DAM from the web UI?
How do you add a component from the components tab to the paragraph system?
How does the DAM appear within the File Manager when you are using the AEM desktop app?
Why should you always verify that a newly created newsletter is available on your publish instance?
presented_options: Because Campaign will try to read it from your publish server
Because Campaign will crash if it is not found
Because Campaign will accept only certain newsletter templates
correct_options: Because Campaign will try to read it from your publish server

quiz_questions.question_text: Which feature of AEM sites allows you to create a snapshot of a page at a point in time?
Experience fragments and content fragments share the ability to automatically summarize text with machine learning.
The Classic UI supports pages and templates created using the template console.
What can you use the template editor for?
presented_options: Positioning components on a responsive grid
correct_options: Positioning components on a responsive grid

quiz_questions.question_text: Which of the following statements are true about editable templates?
presented_options: They allow you to define the structure and initial content
They have no dynamic connection with pages
They're created and edited by templates authors or super users
They are the only way to integrate with other Marketing Cloud solutions
correct_options: They allow you to define the structure and initial content
They're created and edited by templates authors or super users

quiz_questions.question_text: Which of the following actions would benefit the most from the inclusion of an Experience Fragment?
presented_options: Creating raw copy for an editorial page
Creating content that incorporates layout information
correct_options: Creating content that incorporates layout information

quiz_questions.question_text: What can you define in an editable template?
presented_options: The layout of the page for a variety of devices
The policies that define the design properties of a component
The data model for the page
The layout of the native iOS or Android mobile app
The integration with other Marketing Cloud solutions
correct_options: The policies that define the design properties of a component
The layout of the page for a variety of devices

quiz_questions.question_text: You can use the assets from AEM Assets when building templates in the template editor.
What is the template author responsible for?
presented_options: Creating components to be used in a template
Creating templates using the template editor
correct_options: Creating templates using the template editor

quiz_questions.question_text: You can select the layout container of an existing AEM web page and convert it into an Experience Fragment.
Which of the following can authors import into an existing Content Fragment?
After you create a Content Fragment, what is the simplest method of reproducing it with slight modifications?
presented_options: Importing that content fragment into an experience fragment

quiz_questions.question_text: All workflow process steps that you assign to a user or group of users require user action at different stages of the workflow.
After you select the pages you want, which menu button allows you to activate those pages in bulk?
When you create a new workflow model, what two steps are added automatically and can't be deleted?
Only one member can be assigned to a role in a project master.
Which of the following options does the AEM calendar offer?
presented_options: Quick access buttons over each item
correct_options: Quick access buttons over each item

quiz_questions.question_text: Which of the following are true about project masters?
presented_options: They do not have a start or due date
correct_options: They do not have a start or due date

quiz_questions.question_text: Which of the following are available view types for items in your calendar inbox?
What are the three task types you'll find in the inbox?
What can you do within the Inbox in AEM?
The inbox allows you to reassign tasks to different users or user groups.
Where is most content for an AEM website stored?
A client is working on a new project and would like to use Sightly as a preferred templating language. What would be the advantage of using Sightly over JSPs?
presented_options: Sightly provides a much better MVC architecture implementation
correct_options: Sightly provides a much better MVC architecture implementation

quiz_questions.question_text: What information does a marketer have about an ootb AEM site visitor with no additional login?
presented_options: The user's Adobe ID from the Creative Cloud

quiz_questions.question_text: A client wants to set up a globally distributed AEM 6.1 environment. The authors will be spread across the globe, but will work on the same content. What approach should the client use to achieve the above use case?
presented_options: Set up clustering with the help of TARMK
Set up an AEM cluster with CRX2
Set up clustering with the help of MongoDB
Set up an AEM cluster with CRX3
correct_options: Set up clustering with the help of MongoDB

quiz_questions.question_text: In most AEM architectures, the Dispatcher forwards an un-cached request to which of the following?
presented_options: Neither the publish instance or the author instance

quiz_questions.question_text: What mechanism can approve content that a digital marketer adds to a website?
When using AEM multi site manager, all content translation must be managed at a central location.
What is a Live Copy?
presented_options: Copy of language-specific content that is shared amongst various regions
Copy of website or page that has been published to the publish server
Copy of website or page content for which a live relationship with the original source is maintained
Copy of website or page that will be used as a language copy
correct_options: Copy of website or page content for which a live relationship with the original source is maintained

quiz_questions.question_text: What word or phrase describes the relationship between a source and a Live Copy?
Multi Site Manager comes with its own translation engine.
Which MSM sites/tools can help you generate a live copy from a blueprint?

When using a blueprint to create a Live Copy, you can identify which branches are required in the Live Copy; however, when creating a Live Copy from a site, you create the Live Copy and then delete the brand.
Which of the following triggers can be used to initiate a rollout?
Once you cancel the inheritance property on a Live Copy, it is permanent.
Which option would you select to create a Live Copy from a blueprint using the Site Wizard in the Touch UI?
To configure translation capabilities in AEM, you need to install the appropriate translation package and configure it via AEM cloud services.
Inheritance is available for a page and a page component; however, it is not available for page properties.
You should use the On Modification trigger whenever possible as it provides the best performance for AEM sites.
A Live Copy can only have one rollout configuration file associated with it.
